Class Ghost

    • Figure
      • Ghost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Ghost
extends Figure
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class represents the ghosts.
    Author:
    Mira, Anna

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ghost

        public Ghost(Position position,
     GhostCharacter character,
     int x,
     int y)
        Initializes the ghost with a specified character and start position.
        Parameters:
        position - represents the start position of the ghost
        character - represents the character of the ghost
        x - represents the x-coordinate of the position that becomes the target of the ghost when it is dispersing
        y - represents the y-coordinate of the position that becomes the target of the ghost when it is dispersing

    • Method Detail

      • blinking

        public void blinking()
        This method controls the blinking of a ghost when it is escaping.

      • updateToNewLevel

        public void updateToNewLevel(int level)
        This method updated the properties of a ghost to a new level. With increasing level the ghost become faster, the duration of dispersing and escaping decreases and the duration of hunting increases.
        Parameters:
        level - represents the number of the level to which the properties of the ghost are updated.

      • renderDirection

        public Direction renderDirection(Position pacmanPosition,
                        Position inFrontOfGhostHouse)
        This method renders the direction a ghost wants to move in. Depending on his current move pattern a specified position is set as the target. If the ghost is hunting the target is Pacman's position. The method creates a list of the best directions to take in descending order. It returns the first direction that is not contained in the list of invalid directions.
        Parameters:
        pacmanPosition - represents the current position of Pacman.
        inFrontOfGhostHouse - represents the position right in front of the ghost's house.
        Returns:
        The method returns the new direction of the ghost.
